MOD = 1000000007

def fib(x, y, n):
    if n == 0:
        return x
    elif n == 1:
        return y
    else:
        a, b = x, y
        p, q = x, (y*y)%MOD
        r = 2
        while r <= n:
            p, q = (q%MOD, ((p + q)%MOD)*(a%MOD)%MOD)
            r *= 2
        return p

x, y, n = map(int, input().split())
print(fib(x%MOD, y%MOD, n))


EXPLANATION

MOD = 1000000007

def fib(x, y, n):
    if n == 1:
        return x
    elif n == 2:
        return y
    else:
        a, b = x, y
        p, q = x, y
        r = 2
        while r < n:
            p, q = a, b
            a, b = b, (a + b) % MOD
            r += 1
        return b

x, y, n = map(int, input().split())
print(fib(x, y, n))

x, y, n = map(int, input().split())
mod = 10**9 + 7
fib = [0, x%mod, y%mod]
for i in range(3, n+1):
    fib.append((fib[i-1] + fib[i-2]) % mod)
print(fib[n])
